snippet.title: Biggest Beginner Coding Mistake: Separation of Concern
snippet.description:
I'm finally back with a video after taking some time off to rewrite my website to provide mobile support.  Hopefully you still remember who I am and what we do on this channel. I wanted to spend a few minutes today to go over the biggest beginner mistake I'll see when it comes to writing code.  The topic I want to emphasize is separation of concern and why/how its useful. Enjoy.
